stories.title: Scientists stunned by discovery of largest bacterium the size of a fly

stories.text:
Humanity needs near-free limitless energy if we're to sustain and improve our living standards for the future. Nuclear Fusion is the most promising bet to get us to that future. But it's kind of the domain of physicists and hard core engineers. Is there any way a Fullstack Developer can help ? Maybe with building internal tools ?

Also where do we find jobs for programmers in Nuclear Fusion Companies?

Any pointers would be really helpful.
stories.title: Ask HN: What can a developer do to help with Nuclear Fusion?
Some things about getaddrinfo that surprised me

stories.text:
Hi HN,

You can't have missed it: World is in turmoil.

While we obviously can't predict what is going to happen in the physical world, one thing is sure: Cyberwar will intensify a lot in the coming weeks / months.

This is why I decided to offer a big discount on my book Black Hat Rust[0], to be prepared.

The coupon code is: CYBERSTORM

You can get the book here: https://kerkour.com/black-hat-rust-discount-february-2022

The code is also freely available on GitHub: https://github.com/skerkour/black-hat-rust

I know it's a little bit too late for some, but from my situation I thought it's the best way I can help right now.

Best wishes

[0] https://kerkour.com/black-hat-rust
